column2: Ready for your next coding assignment?
I'd like you to add the enemies for level 7, we should have all three kinds of enemies.
You should go to the code view as usual.
Look for the spawnEnemy() function and make sure to return all 3 kinds of enemies: asteroid, beam, and squid.
You could pick one at random to spawn every second.
Or you could even spawn all 3 every time!
Let's see if we get all 3 enemies...
Enemies are rather lacking. Are you sure you spawned some? Go back and check.
We're missing some enemy types. Go back and make sure to spawn all 3 types.
That solution is correct. Well done. Perhaps you could use a XXXXX?
You can have it. There are lots of interesting things that can be built with it. Bye.
